properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT '{Config.sourceSystem}' AS SRC_SYS_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.PRODUCTID) as PROD_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as FCTRY_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.PRODUCTFAMILYID) as PROD_FMLY_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.PRODUCTTYPEID) as PROD_TYPE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SPEC_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.WORKFLOWBASEID) as WRKF_BASE_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.WORKFLOWID) as WRKF_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ADD_POWER_CD
, CAST(PRODUCT.ccfAllJobsComplete as BOOLEAN ) as ALL_JOBS_CMPLT_IND
, CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) as ALWAYS_OVR_RIDE_EXPN_DTTM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ARMOUR_TYPE_CD
, INT(PRODUCT.EthJz_NoOfArms) as ARMS_CNT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as AXIS_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as BASE_CRV_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.BRANDNAME) as BRND_NM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as BTCH_MGMT_REQ_TXT
, TRIM(PRODUCT.BILLOFPROCESSID) as BILL_OF_PRCS_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.BILLOFPROCESSBASEID) as BILL_OF_PRCS_BASE_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.BOMBASEID) as BOM_BASE_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.BOMID) as BOM_ID
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as BP_BTCH_CTL_IND
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as BP_MAX_QTY_ALLW_EXPRSSN_TXT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as BP_MIN_QTY_ALLW_EXPRSSN_TXT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as BP_REQ_QTY_EXPRSSN_TXT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as BP_SCALE_GRP_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.EthJz_BranchPlant) as BRNCH_PLNT_CD
, CAST(PRODUCT.cscBypassBatchContainerRelChec as BOOLEAN ) as BYPAS_BTCH_CNTNR_REL_CHK_IND
, CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as CTN_QTY
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as CTN_TYPE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as CTN_UOM_ID
, CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as CASE_QTY
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as CASE_UOM_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.CATALOGNUMBER) as CATLG_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as CELL_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.EthJz_CellNumber) as CELL_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as CTR_THKNESS_VAL
, INT(PRODUCT.CHANGECOUNT) as CHG_CNT
, TRIM(PRODUCT.CHANGEHISTORYID) as CHG_HIST_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as COLOR_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ccfCompletionStatusCodeId) as CMPLT_STS_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ccfCompletionStatusReasonId) as CMPLT_STS_RSN_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.CONCOMITANTPRODUCTNUMBER) as CNCMTNT_PROD_NUM
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ccfContainerLevelId) as CNTNR_LVL_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.CONTAINERNUMBERINGRULEID) as CNTNR_NUMING_RULE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as CUM_YLD_QTY
, CAST(PRODUCT.CURRENTCOST AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as CUR_COST_AMT
, TRIM(PRODUCT.CUSTOMERID) as CUST_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.CUSTOMERPRODUCTNUMBER) as CUST_PROD_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as CYL_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as DFLT_INV_LOC_CD
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as DIAM_VAL
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ccfDeviceTypeId) as DVC_TYPE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as DENIER_SIZE_MEAS
, TRIM(PRODUCT.DEVICETYPE) as DVC_TYPE_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.DOCUMENTSETID) as DOC_SET_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as DRWG_NUM
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ECO) as ENGR_CHG_ORDR_NUM
, TRIM(PRODUCT.GLENTITY) as ERP_ACTG_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ERPBOMBASEID) as ERP_BOM_BASE_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ERPBOMID) as ERP_BOM_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ERP_DOC_NM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ERP_DOC_VERS_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ERP_MATL_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ERP_PLNT_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ERP_QUAL_INSP_TYPE_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ERPROUTEBASEID) as ERP_RTE_BASE_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ERPROUTEID) as ERP_RTE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as EXPN_DT_FMT_CD
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as EXPN_DT_SPEC_BASE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as EXPN_DT_SPEC_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as EXPN_DT_TRX_ID
, CAST(NULL AS INT) as EXPRIATION_PER_NBR
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as EXPRIATION_PER_UNIT_CD
, CAST(PRODUCT.EXTERNALLYCONTROLLED as BOOLEAN ) as EXTR_CTL_IND
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as FMLY_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.FEFOENFORCE) as FEFO_ENFRC_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.FEFOOVERRIDEESIGREQUIREMENTID) as FEFO_OVRDE_SGNTR_REQ_ID
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as GEL_PROD_IND
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as GS1_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ICONID) as ICON_ID
, CAST(PRODUCT.INSPECTALL as BOOLEAN ) as INSP_ALL_IND
, CAST(PRODUCT.INVENTORYCONTROLLED as BOOLEAN ) as INV_CTL_IND
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as IO_CD
, CAST(PRODUCT.ISFROZEN as BOOLEAN ) as IS_FRZN_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_LIMERICK_PROD_IND
, CAST(PRODUCT.ISPHANTOM as BOOLEAN ) as IS_PHANTOM_IND
, CAST(PRODUCT.ccfIssueFromEnforce as BOOLEAN ) as ISS_FROM_ENFRC_IND
, CAST(PRODUCT.ccfIssueToEnforce as BOOLEAN ) as ISS_TO_ENFRC_IND
, TRIM(PRODUCT.EthJz_ItemNumber) as ITM_NUM
, TRIM(PRODUCT.EthJz_ItemShortName) as ITM_SHRT_NM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as JDE_RTE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as LANG_KEY_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as LGTH_C_MEAS
, CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as LGTH_I_MEAS
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as LINE_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.EthJz_LineNumber) as LINE_NUM
, CAST(PRODUCT.LOTCONTROLLED as BOOLEAN ) as LOT_CTL_IND
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as MFG_DT_SPEC_BASE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as MFG_DT_SPEC_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as MFG_DT_TRX_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as MSTR_PLNG_FMLY_CD
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as MAX_ADD_POWER_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS INT) as MAX_BTCH_CNSMPTN_CNT
, CAST(TRIM(PRODUCT.MESf_UpdateExpireOnCompIss) AS BOOLEAN) as MESF_UPDT_EXP_ON_CMPNT_ISS_IND
, CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as MFG_LEAD_TIME_MEAS
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as MOD_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.MODELNUMBER) as MDL_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as MRP_CTL_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as MULTI_LVL_PROD_IND
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as NEEDLE_TYPE_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.NOTES) as NOTES_TXT
, TRIM(PRODUCT.CDOTYPEID) as OBJ_TYPE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as OPEN_TIME_2_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as OVRD_AQL_LEVL_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ccfOwnerId) as OWN_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PER_CD
, INT(PRODUCT.EthJz_PiecesPerBox) as PCS_PER_BOX_CNT
, CAST(PRODUCT.PLANNEDCOST AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as PLAN_COST_AMT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PLNT_NM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PRPRC_TXT
, TRIM(PRODUCT.EthJz_ProcessSpecDesc1) as PRCS_SPEC_1_DESC
, TRIM(PRODUCT.EthJz_ProcessSpecDesc2) as PRCS_SPEC_2_DESC
, TRIM(PRODUCT.EthJz_ProcessSpecCode) as PRCS_SPEC_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.PRODUCTBASEID) as PROD_BASE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PROD_BRND_NM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PROD_DTLS_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION) as PROD_DESC
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PROD_2_DESC
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PROD_GRP_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PROD_ISS_GRP_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PROD_OTH_NM
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ccfProductRecipeBaseId) as PROD_RECIPE_BASE_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ccfProductRecipeId) as PROD_RECIPE_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.PRODUCTREVISION) as PROD_RVSN_NUM
, TRIM(PRODUCT.PRODUCTVARIATION) as PROD_VAR_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PROD_VERS_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PRDTN_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as RAW_MATL_TYPE_CD
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as RECIPE_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as RESRTABLE_CD
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as RMT_VERIF_REQ_IND
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as RXDX_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.SAMPLINGPLANID) as SMPLG_PLAN_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.SAMPLINGPLANBASEID) as SMPLG_PLAN_BASE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SAP_MATL_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as SEND_EXP_DT_TO_ERP_IND
, CAST(PRODUCT.SERIALCONTROLLED as BOOLEAN ) as SER_CTL_IND
, CAST(NULL AS INT) as SHLF_LIF_DAYS_CNT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SHLF_LIF_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SHRT_BRND_NM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SHRT_NM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SKU_COLOR_CD
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SPC_CHRT_GRP_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SPHERE_POWER_VAL
, CAST(PRODUCT.STDSTARTQTY AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as STD_STRT_QTY
, CAST(PRODUCT.STDSTARTQTY2 AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as STD_STRT_2_QTY
, INT(PRODUCT.STDSTARTUOM2ID) as STD_STRT_UOM_2_ID
, CAST(PRODUCT.STDCOST AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as STD_UNIT_COST_AMT
, TRIM(PRODUCT.STATUS) as STS_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.STDSTARTUOMID) as STD_STRT_UOM_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as STERILIZATION_TYPE_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.EthJz_SterSpecCode) as STER_SPEC_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.EthJz_SterSpecDescription) as STER_SPEC_DESC
, CAST(PRODUCT.STOCKPOINTCONTROLLED as BOOLEAN ) as STK_PT_CTL_IND
, INT(PRODUCT.EthJz_StrandCount) as ETH_STRAND_CNT
, TRIM(PRODUCT.SUBFACTORY) as SUB_FCTRY_NM
, CAST(PRODUCT.EthJz_SutureLen AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as SUTURE_LEN_MEAS
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SUTURE_MTRC_CD
, CAST(PRODUCT.EthJz_SutureSize AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as SUTURE_SIZE_MEAS
, CAST(PRODUCT.TARGETCYCLETIME AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as TRGT_CYC_TM
, TRIM(PRODUCT.TARGETDURATIONPERUNIT) as TRGT_DUR_PER_UNIT_VAL
, CAST(PRODUCT.TARGETFINALYIELD AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as TRGT_FNL_YLD_AMT
, CAST(PRODUCT.TARGETROLLEDTHROUGHPUTYIELD AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as TRGT_ROLLD_THRUPUT_YLD_QTY
, CAST(PRODUCT.TARGETUNITSPERHOUR AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as TRGT_UNIT_PER_HR_QTY
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as TEAM_CTR_RLSE_STS_CD
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as TOT_SHLF_LIF_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as TRACEABL_INFO_TXT
, INT(PRODUCT.ccfTrngRecentExpDays) as TRNG_RCNT_EXP_DAYS_CNT
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ccfTrngRecentId) as TRNG_RCNT_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.TRAININGREQGROUPID) as TRNG_REQ_GRP_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as UDI_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as UDI_TRX_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as UOM_2_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as UOM_CONV_DENOM_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as UOM_CONV_NUMRTR_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as UPC_CHK_DIG_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as UPC_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as UV_CD
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as VAL_STREM_TXT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as VRNT_TYPE_CD
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as VISIT_INT_CD
, TRIM(PRODUCT.WIPMSGDEFMGRID) as WIP_MSG_DEF_MGR_ID
, TRIM(PRODUCT.ccfStartReasonId) as STRT_RSN_ID
, CAST(NULL AS INT) as STRAND_CNT
FROM  {Config.sourceDatabase}.PRODUCT as PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT._deleted_ =  'F'
  
 
""")
